EmailTemplate.name: DPS - Prepreg Companies
EmailTemplate.subject: Prepreg Companies
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName},
Thank you for your interest in Dupont products.
DuPont manufactures the fiber. Customers take our product to manufacture fabrics and pregreg them. Below a list of companies that handle the pregreg.
Prepreg Companies COMPANY ADDRESS PHONE FAX WEB ADDRESS Cytec 851 W 18th Street Costa Mesa, CA 92627 949-650-8106 949-631-6190 http://www.cytec.com/ Barrday 75 Moorefield Street, PO Box 790, N1T 1S2, Canada
1450 West Pointe Dr. Unit C Charlotte, North Carolina US 28214 (800)667-3725 (800) 667-3725 (519) 621-4123 www.barrday.com
Paneltech Products, Inc 2999 John Stevens Way Hoquiam, Washington 98550 360.538.1480 360.538.1510 http://paneltechintl.com/
Sioux Manufacturing P.O. Box 400 Fort Totten, North Dakota 58335-0400 (701) 766-4211 (701) 766-4228 /www.siouxmanufacturing.com
Barrday 86 Providence Road Millbury, MA 01527 800-225-7725 508-865-0302 www.barrday.com
DuPont Protection Solutions
This source list is designed to present a representative group of suppliers. It may not necessarily include all the companies selling or making these products and is subject to revision at any time. It is not an endorsement of any specific manufacturer.
